类 SimpleBudgetCalculator

java.lang.Object
com.financeapp.model.SimpleBudgetCalculator
public class SimpleBudgetCalculator extends Object
Simple Budget Calculator Calculates monthly expenses and generates budget suggestions

  • 方法详细资料

    • calculateMonthlyExpenses

      public Map<String,Double> calculateMonthlyExpenses(List<Transaction> transactions, int year, int month)
      Calculate monthly expenses
      参数:
      transactions - List of transactions
      year - Year to calculate for
      month - Month to calculate for
      返回:
      Map of expenses by category

    • calculateExpensesInRange

      public Map<String,Double> calculateExpensesInRange(List<Transaction> transactions, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate)
      Calculate expenses in a date range
      参数:
      transactions - List of transactions
      startDate - Start date
      endDate - End date
      返回:
      Map of expenses by category

    • generateBudgetSuggestions

      public List<String> generateBudgetSuggestions(Map<String,Double> currentExpenses, Map<String,Double> historicalAverage)
      Generate budget suggestions
      参数:
      currentExpenses - Current month expenses
      historicalAverage - Historical average expenses
      返回:
      List of suggestions

    • calculateHistoricalAverage

      public Map<String,Double> calculateHistoricalAverage(List<Transaction> transactions, int months)
      Calculate historical average expenses
      参数:
      transactions - List of transactions
      months - Number of months to consider
      返回:
      Map of average expenses by category

    • detectExpenseAlerts

      public List<String> detectExpenseAlerts(Map<String,Double> currentExpenses, Map<String,Double> thresholds)
      Detect expense alerts
      参数:
      currentExpenses - Current expenses
      thresholds - Threshold settings
      返回:
      List of alert messages

    • detectAbnormalExpenses

      public List<String> detectAbnormalExpenses(Map<String,Double> currentExpenses, Map<String,Double> historicalAverage)
      Detect if expenses exceed historical average
      参数:
      currentExpenses - Current expenses
      historicalAverage - Historical average
      返回:
      List of alert messages

    • detectTrendAlerts

      public List<String> detectTrendAlerts(List<Transaction> transactions, int monthsToAnalyze)
      Detect trend-based expense alerts Analyzes spending patterns over time to detect concerning trends
      参数:
      transactions - List of all transactions
      monthsToAnalyze - Number of months to analyze for trends
      返回:
      List of trend alert messages
